column2: ideas
Discrete notifications on smart watch for recs during dates
Use geolocation to provide relevant recs when user is in store
Digital wine glasses
In aisle screens that detect user's presence and wine profile, provide recs
Popular celebrities for male audience giving recs (e.g. sports stars, etc.)
Take picture of meal at home/restaurant and wine you had with it, rate the pairing
Take picture of groceries in car and app returns recommendation for wine pairing
RFID in wine fridge to alert users they might have good bottle for pairing with food already
Social network for wine recs
Smart watch notifications
Allow bottles to interact with people (e.g. RFID, etc.)
ML algo to provide recs on similar food/wine combos user likely to enjoy
Allow filtering by price
Take picture of menu/grocery list and get rec
Recs based on friends liked bottles
Notify users of nearby wineries
Pair with Coravin system for experienced users
Screens on shopping carts provide recs, distract kids
Match 23&Me/Ancestry.com genetic profiles to mass spectometry data for wine to make precise recs based on user's unique tastes
Links to wine experts explaining details of a specific wine
Partner with restaurant for cut of profits as opposed to ad model (reduces annoying advertisements)
